name: Overloaded Senses
text: Treat the printed text box of your identity and each of your [[superpower]] upgrades as if they were blank (except for [[traits]]). Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Heimdall → remove Overloaded Senses from the game.

name: Judgement of All Gods
text: Mangog was unleashed once again and raged that he would bring about the ultimate judgment upon the Asgardians. Supports cannot ready. The Bifrost cannot be flipped to its [[closed]] side. When Revealed: Exhaust each support. Flip The Bifrost to its [[opened]] side. [amplify]

name: Mangog
text: Mangog entering play cannot be canceled. Triggered ability on The Bifrost cannot be resolved. [star]Mangog gets +1 ATK for each [[asgard]] character you control. (Heimdall’s nemesis minion.) "Time for Gods to die screaming and wailing!"

name: Kingdom In Ruin
text: When Revealed: Choose to either discard a support you control or take 1+X indirect damage, where X is equal to the printed cost of the support you control with the highest cost. Otherwise, this card gains surge. [star]Boost: Deal 2 damage to an ally you control.

name: Unquenchable Rage
text: When Revealed: Find the Mangog minion and put him into play engaged with you. Then, Mangog attacks an ally you control (attacks you with +1 ATK instead if you do not control any ally). [star] Boost: Mangog attacks you after this activation.
